scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('You must use Yarn to install, not NPM')"
scripts.docker-build: docker-compose run --rm front npm run build
scripts.docker-test:unit: docker-compose run --rm -e CI=true front npm run -s test
scripts.docker-test:unit:watch: docker-compose run --rm front npm run -s test
